benchmark_details.name: Densely Captioned Images (DCI)
benchmark_details.overview: We release the Densely Captioned Images (DCI) dataset, which contains dense and mask-aligned captions, alongside an LLM-summarized version (sDCI) containing captions under 77 tokens for use with current VLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To collect a dataset of highly aligned text and image pairs primarily for evaluating how well existing models can make use of all of the data.

data.source: Images sampled from a random privacy-mitigated subset of SA-1B.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the performance of vision-language models on tasks using DCI.
methodology.interpretation: Performance evaluated by how well models perform on subtasks using the dense captions.
methodology.validation: Models validated against existing benchmarks such as VL-Checklist and ARO.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All known instances of people in the dataset have been face-blurred as per the SA-1B release.
